item.title: Meteorologists Say the National Weather Service Did Its Job in Texas
item.description: DOGE cut hundreds of jobs at the NWS, but experts who spoke to WIRED say the agency accurately predicted the state's weekend flood risk.

item.title: Ask not for whom the Louvre of Bluesky tolls, it tolls for thee
item.description: It’s a sad weekend over at Bluesky, where one of the best accounts has disappeared — though we can still hope for its resurrection.

item.title: The 55 Best Deals From REI’s July 4 Outdoor Gear Sale (2025)
item.description: Whether you need a camp chair, sleeping pad, running shoes, or new pack, REI’s Independence Day sale has something for everyone.
